vsParam:
Have you heard of it?
A horrifying monster was spotted near the Academy!

Ah, I heard that too!
This is a ferocious monster, it's super powerful!

Hmm... [px], your expression...
As if it's saying "let's go strike it down now!"
Let's go strike it down now!

Huh, exactly the same...
We can't turn a blind eye to it...
Yeah. No one gets hurt now, we should...

Huh!? Hazel!? What are you doing here?
W, what on earth is going on!?
Leave the monster-killing quest to us!

[px] and you guys, you have something else to do, right?
So, take care of your own stuff first.

There's no but!
This is an order from the Student Union President!

You guys always help others, right?
Just give us some chances to show our capabilities.

If you insist, this quest is yours.
I believe in you!

Okay, count it on me!
We'll slay the monster in a blink of an eye!
I can't be the only one who does nothing...

Ha ha, you still wouldn't accept no matter what I said...
You are really serious and stubborn.

I see. How about this?
[px], go make bombs.

We'll use your bombs to kill the monster while guaranteeing
our safety. Is this okay for you?

Hee hee, okay!
It's settled then, [px]!

Please go prepare some
powerful bombs!
